---
title: Swiss Roll Comparison
---

```{r}
library(RtsneWithP)
library(fs)
library(glue)
library(neMDBD)
library(readr)
```

```{r}
noise <- 1
data_dir <- path("distortions/docs/tutorials/data/")
X <- read_csv(data_dir / "swiss_noise_{noise}.csv") |>
    as.matrix()
Y <- read_csv(data_dir / "swiss_noise_{noise}_embedding.csv") |>
    as.matrix()
```

```{r}
pscore <- perturbation_score_compute(X, Y, 100, approx = 2)
write_csv(pscore, data_dir/glue("pscore_{noise}.csv"))
```
